alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 10:41PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG DEVELOPING ACROSS THE FOOTHILLS AND WESTERN PIEDMONT OF NORTH CAROLINA... Cool temperatures, light wind, and abundant low level moisture has set the stage for fog to develop across the foothills and western Piedmont of North Carolina this evening. The fog had become dense in a few isolated locations with visibility below 1/2 mile, but the dense fog may become more widespread later tonight, especially near the Blue Ridge Escarpment. If you are planning to travel across these areas, watch for sharply reduced visibility. Slow down, use low beam headlights, and keep plenty of distance between you and the vehicles in front of you.
